Package com.deco2800.game.crafting

Interface Buildable

public interface Buildable
Public Interface that indicates what items are buildable and not in a game. To make an item buildable, implement the interface and override its base method.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final Map<Materials,Integer>
    craftingRecipe
    Hashmap that contains the crafting recipe of the item.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default Map<Materials,Integer>
    getRequiredMaterials()
    Default setter method that returns the crafting recipe for the class.
    void
    setCraftingRecipe()
    The method that will set the required recipe to craft the item.

  • Field Details

    • craftingRecipe

      static final Map<Materials,Integer> craftingRecipe
      Hashmap that contains the crafting recipe of the item. The key will contain the enum class material and the values will contain teh amount of the material required.

  • Method Details

    • setCraftingRecipe

      void setCraftingRecipe()
      The method that will set the required recipe to craft the item. Enum class materials were chosen as the key as they would not be duplicated. The keys will store an integer stating the amount of the material required for crafting.

    • getRequiredMaterials

      default Map<Materials,Integer> getRequiredMaterials()
      Default setter method that returns the crafting recipe for the class.
      Returns:
      a map containing the crafting recipe
